channel.title: Making SoulSplit Items Non-Donor? Please
channel.description:
Hello, I was wondering if someone could please help me.
I'm using a source called SoulSplit, I have a problem because only donators can wear bandos, party hats, and hat items... I was wondering if someone could help me out cause I can't figure out how to make these items available to ALL players, so you don't have to be a Donator in order to wear them.
Thanks :)

item.title: Making SoulSplit Items Non-Donor? Please
item.dc:creator: @kyle123321 kyle123321
item.description:
@kyle123321 wrote:

Okay thank you very much, keep me updated please.

Read full topic

item.title: Making SoulSplit Items Non-Donor? Please
item.dc:creator: @kyle123321 kyle123321
item.description:
@kyle123321 wrote:

Well you seem to know alot of this type of source, I was wondering if you could help me out with this, okay the ::givedonor gives the rank of donator, and 500 ssp, now I want it to also give a yellow party hat, I’ve tried many things and can’t figure it out.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("givedonor") && c.playerRights >= 3 && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Kyle") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Ryan") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Kyle") && playerCommand.charAt(10) == ' ') { // use as ::ssp name try { String playerToG = playerCommand.substring(10); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToG)) { Server.playerHandler.players[i].pcPoints += 500; c.sendMessage("You have given "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName+" 500 SSP from: "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].connectedFrom); Server.playerHandler.players[i].isDonator = 1; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

Read full topic
